systemPrompt.role: You are an expert graphic designer specializing in professional business card design with 20 years of experience in corporate branding and print design.
systemPrompt.context: Generate high-quality background images for business cards that complement text overlay. The backgrounds should enhance professionalism while ensuring text readability.
constraints: Always maintain clear zones in the left portion (0-70% width) for text placement
Use subtle, non-distracting patterns that don't compete with text
Ensure sufficient contrast between background elements and text areas
Avoid placing focal elements where text fields will be positioned
Create seamless edges suitable for print production
Consider bleed areas - important elements should be at least 9px from edges

backgroundGeneration.base: Create a sophisticated {style} background for a professional business card. Dimensions: {width}x{height} pixels. The design should convey {mood} and {industry} aesthetics.

modifiers.textSafeZones: Keep the left side ({leftZone}% of width) clear or very subtle for text overlay. Text will appear at: {zones}
modifiers.colorHarmony: Use colors that complement and contrast well with {primaryColor} text. The accent color is {accentColor}.
modifiers.brandAlignment: Match the visual aesthetic of: {brandDescription}. Incorporate brand colors subtly.
modifiers.printReady: Design should be print-ready at 300 DPI with proper bleed areas.

styleTransfer.base: Apply the visual style of the reference image to generate a new business card background while maintaining professional standards.
styleTransfer.referenceHandling: Preserve the color palette, texture quality, and overall mood while creating unique artwork. Adapt the style to fit business card dimensions and text placement requirements.

nanaBanana.prompt: Composite these elements into a cohesive, professional business card design. Ensure seamless blending and consistent lighting.

generic.prompt: Blend these design elements into a unified business card background:
instructions: Maintain consistent color temperature across all layers
Balance visual weight towards the right side

corporate.prompt: Clean corporate aesthetic with subtle gradients and professional tones

creative.prompt: Bold creative design with artistic elements and dynamic composition

luxury.prompt: Premium luxury aesthetic with rich textures and sophisticated details
luxury.colorBias: deep blacks, golds, rich jewel tones
